thag5.3:1.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:1.2: my little hut is roofed and pleasant, <j>sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:1.4: so rain, sky, if you wish.
thag5.3:2.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:2.2: my little hut is roofed and pleasant, <j>sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:2.3: I meditate there, my mind at peace:
thag5.3:2.4: so rain, sky, if you wish.
thag5.3:3.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:3.2: my little hut is roofed and pleasant, <j>sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:3.3: I meditate there, free of greed:
thag5.3:3.4: so rain, sky, if you wish.
thag5.3:4.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:4.2: my little hut is roofed and pleasant, <j>sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:4.3: I meditate there, free of hate:
thag5.3:4.4: so rain, sky, if you wish.
thag5.3:5.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:5.2: my little hut is roofed and pleasant, <j>sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:5.3: I meditate there, free of delusion:
thag5.3:5.4: so rain, sky, if you wish.
